description: Generate hero images and visual assets for articles using AI

optional_params.name: organization_branding
optional_params.description: Include Sing for Hope visual themes (arts, community, inclusivity)

response_format.image_data: base64 encoded image or temporary URL
response_format.description_used: final prompt sent to generation service

error_codes.GENERATION_FAILED: I couldn't generate the image. Want to try with a different description?
error_codes.DESCRIPTION_TOO_VAGUE: What should the image show? I need a clearer description.
error_codes.INAPPROPRIATE_CONTENT: I can't generate that image. Please try a different description.
error_codes.RATE_LIMITED: Image generation is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
error_codes.QUOTA_EXCEEDED: Image generation quota reached. Please try again tomorrow.

usage_notes: Default to 16:9 ratio for hero images (standard web format)
Always incorporate Sing for Hope themes unless explicitly asked otherwise
Generate high resolution (at least 1200px wide) for hero images
Description should be detailed but concise (2-3 sentences)
Avoid text in generated images (hard to read, translation issues)
Use warm, inclusive imagery aligned with nonprofit mission
Return raw image data for immediate preview
Image must be uploaded via image_storage tool to get permanent URL
